data.title: New York Audiobooks
data.meta_description: Explore the best-selling and newly released New York audiobooks and original audio performances on Audible.
data.text:

Unabridged

Manhattan Assistant District Attorney Roger "Butch" Karp has been around New York long enough to realize that the judicial system can be dirty and cynical. But he still believes in justice....

Dive into the heart of New York City with this captivating guide. Discover the captivating saga of one of the worlds most iconic cities.

Lev Davidovich Trotsky burst onto the world stage in November 1917 as coleader of a Marxist Revolution seizing power in Russia. It made him one of the most recognized personalities....

Length: 7 hrs and 30 mins

Unabridged

4.5 out of 5 stars 161

Bad Call is Mike Scardino's visceral, fast-moving, and mordantly funny account of the summers he spent working as an "ambulance attendant" on the streets of late-1960s New York. Rich with details that bring Mike's world to life, Bad Call is a gritty portrait of a bygone era....

5 out of 5 stars

I loved this book!
